name: test_12_4_0_delete_edit_own_and_others_post
description:
Test that an admin can delete and edit own posts, replies and posts/replies created by others.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Postpartum community page
4. Create a new post with image
5. Publish the post and verify creation
6. Edit the post with new content
7. Add a comment to the post
8. Delete the comment
9. Delete the post
descriptionHtml:
Test that an admin can delete and edit own posts, replies and posts/replies created by others.

Test Steps:

  1. Launch the browser
  2. Login as admin user
  3. Navigate to Postpartum community page
  4. Create a new post with image
  5. Publish the post and verify creation
  6. Edit the post with new content
  7. Add a comment to the post
  8. Delete the comment
  9. Delete the post
statusMessage:
playwright._impl._errors.TimeoutError: Locator.scroll_into_view_if_needed: Timeout 30000ms exceeded.
Call log:
  - waiting for locator("article").filter(has_text="Updated post content").first.locator("xpath=ancestor::div[contains(@class, 'css-55jug0')]").locator("button[aria-label='Options']").first
statusTrace:
@allure.feature("12.0.0 CMS Communities")
    @allure.epic("Web CMS Testing")
    @allure.story("12.4.0 Delete/Edit Posts and Comments")
    @allure.severity(allure.severity_level.NORMAL)
    @allure.description("""
    Test that an admin can delete and edit own posts, replies and posts/replies created by others.
    
    Test Steps:
    1. Launch the browser
    2. Login as admin user
    3. Navigate to Postpartum community page
    4. Create a new post with image
    5. Publish the post and verify creation
    6. Edit the post with new content
    7. Add a comment to the post
    8. Delete the comment
    9. Delete the post
    """)
    def test_12_4_0_delete_edit_own_and_others_post():
        with sync_playwright() as p:
            # Launch browser with larger viewport
            browser = p.chromium.launch(headless=False)
            page = browser.new_page(viewport={'width': 1920, 'height': 1080})
    
            # Login using the existing login class
            login_page = LoginPage(page)
            login_page.loginDev(admin_user, admin_pw)
    
            # Navigate to the Postpartum community page
            community_page = CommunityPage(page)
            community_page.go_to_postpartum_community()
    
            # Create a new post to test edit and delete
            image_path = "uploads/images.jpeg"
            post_text = community_page.create_new_post(image_path)
    
            # Publish the post
            community_page.publish_post()
    
            # Verify post creation
            community_page.verify_post_created(post_text)
    
            # Edit the post
            new_text = "Updated post content"
            community_page.edit_post(new_text)
    
            # Add a comment to the post
            comment = "This is a comment"
            community_page.comment_on_post(comment)  # Now passing only the comment
    
            # # Delete the comment
            # community_page.delete_comment()
    
            # Delete the post
>           community_page.delete_post(new_text)
